original_text: And the five men that went to spy out the land went up, and came in thither, and took the graven image, and the ephod, and the teraphim, and the molten image: and the priest stood in the entering of the gate with the six hundred men that were appointed with weapons of war.
korean_text: 그 땅을 정탐하러 갔던 다섯 사람이 그리로 들어가서 새긴 신상과 에봇과 드라빔과 부어 만든 신상을 가져갈 때에 그 제사장은 무기를 지닌 육백 명과 함께 문 입구에 섰더니

sentences.original_text: And the five men that went to spy out the land went up
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 땅을 정탐하러 갔던 다섯 사람이 올라갔고

sentences.original_text: and the priest stood in the entering of the gate
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 성문 입구에 서 있었는데

sentences.original_text: with the six hundred men that were appointed with weapons of war
sentences.korean_translation: 전쟁 무기로 임명된 육백 명의 사람들과 함께 있었다
